title: Stability
content: Stability is a reflection of a structure's endurance; the more stable, the less likely it is to fall apart. If it reaches zero, it will break instantly upon placement. A stability percentage is visible when mousing over a building object at melee range with a hammer.

sections.title: Pillars (Older Versions)
sections.content:
Pillars used to be in the game, but they were removed in Update 196, which took effect on February 1st, 2018. Pillars were used to add more stability to floors above.
